== Velappaya (627812) ==

Velappaya is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 446 hectares and harbouring 1185 households with total population of 4575 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 2233 and female population is 2342. Scheduled Caste Population is 567 and Scheduled Tribes population is 27. Census Location Code of the village is 627812<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate female population: 2073 (88.51%)
